modName: Diverse Guard Armor Texture - Resource by Phil
descriptionHtml:
Diverse Guard Armor Texture Resource
--------------------------

Author
------
PhilSchmidheiny

This is a texture resource of different guard armor textures to give the guards a more different look.
The textures will be featured in my Total Conversion in the distant future and I thought other modders could use them for their own mods.

Do whatever you like with the texture but please give me credits.

Please report any problem as soon as possible (e.g. missing textures, textures with erros etc.)

Content
-------

6 textures for every hold guard armor:

-01a suffix: leather vest, brown belt, silver clasps and silver chainmail
-01b suffix: leather vest, brown belt, golden clasps and golden chainmail
-02a: suffix: scaled vest, brown belt, silver clasps and silver chainmail, silver rivets on scales
-02b: suffix: scaled vest, brown belt, golden clasps and golden chainmail, golden rivets on scales
-03a: suffix: scaled vest, brown belt, silver clasps and silver chainmail, silver edge and silver rivets on scales
-03b: suffix: scaled vest, brown belt, golden clasps and golden chainmail, golden edge and golden rivets on scales

2 textures for every hold guard helmet

both female and male versions of the armor are included.

Texture size: 4k (armor) and 2k (helmets)
author: PhilSchmidheiny
